mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tbl (mem_name, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_email, mbti, nickname,mem_img) VALUES (#{mem_name},#{mem_id},#{mem_pwd},#{mem_email},#{mbti},#{nickname},#{mem_img})
mapper.update: UPDATE member_tbl set mem_pwd=#{mem_pwd}, mbti=#{mbti} , nickname=#{nickname}, mem_img=#{mem_img}, myword=#{myword} where mem_no=#{mem_no}
mapper.select: select m.mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mbti, m.mem_img, m.nickname, m.myword from member_tbl m inner join friendship f on m.mem_no = f.mem_no2 where f.mem_no = #{f.mem_no}
